My First Blog Post

This is my first blog post using 11ty.

Markdown Support

11ty has great support for Markdown, which makes writing content easy and enjoyable.

You can use all standard Markdown features:

  • Lists
  • Bold text
  • Italic text
  • Links
  • Code blocks
// Example code
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, world!");
}

Deployment

This blog is set up to be deployed on Cloudflare Pages, which provides:

  1. Fast global CDN
  2. Automatic HTTPS
  3. Easy deployment from GitHub
